title: Looking For Coaching or Advice (Lvl)
body:
Hey, I am relativity new to the game and looking for some tips to improve. I am lvl 21 (First Account). Favourite champs atm  are Poppy, Jax, Veigar, Rammus, Gragas, Teemo and Brand. If you don't really wanna coach if you could put some tips in the comments that would be appreciated
 
Looking to Learn,
 - Laning
 - Roles (Top, Mid, Sup, Jungle)
 - Mid to Late Game
 - General Game Sense
 - Wave Management 

My IGN is "RexonaMotion" add me if interested.
